abstract: Starts mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
overview:
## Discussion

Call this method in your watchOS app to start a mirrored workout session on the companion iOS app. If your iOS app isn’t running, the system launches it in the background. The iOS companion app must assign a completion handler to its HealthKit Store’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore/workoutSessionMirroringStartHandler] property to process the incoming session.

items.description: Stops mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
items.name: stopMirroringToCompanionDevice(completion:)

items.description: Sends the provided data to the remote workout session.
items.name: sendToRemoteWorkoutSession(data:completion:)
